product_description: Manyavar transformed men’s ethnic fashion wear into a signature statement. Soon the brand opened up a much wider variety of men’s garments and accessories which rendered it as a one stop shop for celebration wear. During the course of its evolution, the label became synonymous with wedding wear; a one-stop-store, draping the world with joy and finest Indian elegance. Thus, Manyavar completed celebration. Manyavar’s timeless celebration collection includes exquisite Sherwanis, fine Indo-Westerns, Royal Bandhgalas, classic Kurta-Jackets and matching accessories for life’s special moments. Not leaving behind the juniors, Manyavar started with their Kid’s Ethnic and Fusion wear line which was a delight to the little ones.

product_description: Manyavar transformed men’s ethnic fashion wear into a signature statement. Soon the brand opened up a much wider variety of men’s garments and accessories which rendered it as a one stop shop for celebration wear. During the course of its evolution, the label became synonymous with wedding wear; a one-stop-store, draping the world with joy and finest Indian elegance. Thus, Manyavar completed celebration. Manyavar’s timeless celebration collection includes exquisite Sherwanis, fine Indo-Westerns, Royal Bandhgalas, classic Kurta-Jackets and matching accessories for life’s special moments. Not leaving behind the juniors, Manyavar started with their Kid’s Ethnic and Fusion wear line which was a delight to the little ones.

product_description: Impress everyone with your amazing fashion sense by donning this elegant kurta for men. Tailored from finest fabric and fashioned with a mandarin collar for a dash of style. It is a great addition to your wardrobe and will win you compliments from one and all. Perfect for Gifting: Show the unmatched joy of your happiness to your loved ones by gifting this royal & elegant kurta by Manyavar. Give your friend, brother, dad, or husband. With many appealing colors and fabrics to choose from, your special one will surely outshine everyone else. In the fast-paced world, traditional Indian styles need to be flaunted with a twist. Manyavar brings to you its range of traditional and casual kurta, a perfect blend of royal and festive designs emulated into trendy traditional wear for you.

product_description: Manyavar transformed men’s ethnic fashion wear into a signature statement. Soon the brand opened up a much wider variety of men’s garments and accessories which rendered it as a one stop shop for celebration wear. During the course of its evolution, the label became synonymous with wedding wear; a one-stop-store, draping the world with joy and finest Indian elegance. Thus, Manyavar completed celebration. Manyavar’s timeless celebration collection includes exquisite Sherwanis, fine Indo-Westerns, Royal Bandhgalas, classic Kurta-Jackets and matching accessories for life’s special moments. Not leaving behind the juniors, Manyavar started with their Kid’s Ethnic and Fusion wear line which was a delight to the little ones.

product_description: Impress everyone with your amazing fashion sense by donning this elegant for men. Tailored from finest fabric and fashioned with a mandarin collar for a dash of style. It is a great addition to your wardrobe and will win you compliments from one and all. Perfect for Gifting: Show the unmatched joy of your happiness to your loved ones by gifting this royal & elegant kurta by Manyavar. Give your friend, brother, dad, or husband. In the fast-paced world, traditional Indian styles need to be flaunted with a twist. anyavar brings to you its range of traditional and casual kurta for men, a perfect blend of royal and festive designs emulated into trendy traditional wear for you.

product_description: Manyavar transformed men’s ethnic fashion wear into a signature statement. Soon the brand opened up a much wider variety of men’s garments and accessories which rendered it as a one stop shop for celebration wear. During the course of its evolution, the label became synonymous with wedding wear; a one-stop-store, draping the world with joy and finest Indian elegance. Thus, Manyavar completed celebration. Manyavar’s timeless celebration collection includes exquisite Sherwanis, fine Indo-Westerns, Royal Bandhgalas, classic Kurta-Jackets and matching accessories for life’s special moments. Not leaving behind the juniors, Manyavar started with their Kid’s Ethnic and Fusion wear line which was a delight to the little ones.

product_description: Manyavar transformed men’s ethnic fashion wear into a signature statement. Soon the brand opened up a much wider variety of men’s garments and accessories which rendered it as a one stop shop for celebration wear. During the course of its evolution, the label became synonymous with wedding wear; a one-stop-store, draping the world with joy and finest Indian elegance. Thus, Manyavar completed celebration. Manyavar’s timeless celebration collection includes exquisite Sherwanis, fine Indo-Westerns, Royal Bandhgalas, classic Kurta-Jackets and matching accessories for life’s special moments. Not leaving behind the juniors, Manyavar started with their Kid’s Ethnic and Fusion wear line which was a delight to the little ones.

product_description: Manyavar transformed men’s ethnic fashion wear into a signature statement. Soon the brand opened up a much wider variety of men’s garments and accessories which rendered it as a one stop shop for celebration wear. During the course of its evolution, the label became synonymous with wedding wear; a one-stop-store, draping the world with joy and finest Indian elegance. Thus, Manyavar completed celebration. Manyavar’s timeless celebration collection includes exquisite Sherwanis, fine Indo-Westerns, Royal Bandhgalas, classic Kurta-Jackets and matching accessories for life’s special moments. Not leaving behind the juniors, Manyavar started with their Kid’s Ethnic and Fusion wear line which was a delight to the little ones.

product_description: Manyavar transformed men’s ethnic fashion wear into a signature statement. Soon the brand opened up a much wider variety of men’s garments and accessories which rendered it as a one stop shop for celebration wear. During the course of its evolution, the label became synonymous with wedding wear; a one-stop-store, draping the world with joy and finest Indian elegance. Thus, Manyavar completed celebration. Manyavar’s timeless celebration collection includes exquisite Sherwanis, fine Indo-Westerns, Royal Bandhgalas, classic Kurta-Jackets and matching accessories for life’s special moments. Not leaving behind the juniors, Manyavar started with their Kid’s Ethnic and Fusion wear line which was a delight to the little ones.

product_description: Vastramay brings to you these stylish kurta for man stitched meticulously to fit all body type. This fabric has been designed keeping in mind the latest trends in a casual fashion or occassional fashion. Engineering garments which fit all body types and style is our aim. The kurtha can be paired with a churidar, a dhoti for men, a patiala or a aligarh pyjama based on the overall look. These kurta pajama for men party wear or regular wear are made with superior quality very soft fabric and comfortable wear. product_description: Vastramay brings to you these stylish kurta for man stitched meticulously to fit all body type. This men's ethnic wear fabric has been designed keeping in mind the latest trends in a casual fashion or occassional fashion. Engineering garments which fit all body types and style is our aim. The kurtha can be paired with a churidar, a dhoti for men, a patiala or a aligarh pyjama based on the overall look. These kurta pajama for men party wear or regular wear are made with superior quality very soft fabric and comfortable wear. For one of those big parties just pair the Kurta Set with a Modi Jacket for mens stylish to avoid carrying a servani or indo western for men. To complete the look of this kurta pajama for man adorn a mojari or jutti slippers for men stylish, you may also try an authentic Kohlapuri chappal for men, the fashionistas and millennial folks may experiment with a brogues or oxfords juta for men stylish. Suitable for: Party, Weddings, Sangeet, Mehandi, Regular Wear, Celebrations, Occasions, Festivals, Lohri, Pongal, Makar Sakranti, Baisakhi, Saraswati Puja, Holi, Ugadi, Jamai Sasthi, Eid, Raksha Bandhan, Dussehra, Diwali, Navratri, Pooja, Christmas, Onam, Ganesh Chaturthi, Janmasthmi and Gifts for Men.

product_description: Raymond వారి Ethnix నుండి మీ సందర్భ దుస్తుల సేకరణకు సున్నితమైన చేరికను ఇవ్వండి, ఇది దాని గొప్ప వారసత్వాన్ని యొక్క నిరంతర సృష్టింపు,Make an exquisite inclusion to your occasion wear collection from Ethnix by Raymond, A seamless creation of its rich heritage,Raymond এর Ethnix থেকে আপনার অনুষ্ঠানে একটি দুর্দান্ত অন্তর্ভুক্তি তৈরি করুন, এর সমৃদ্ধ ঐতিহ্যের এক নির্বিঘ্ন সৃষ্টি,Raymond द्वारे Ethnix कडून आपल्या प्रसंगी पोशाख संग्रहात एक उत्कृष्ट समावेश करा, त्याच्या समृद्ध वारशाची अखंड निर्मिती,Ethnix by Raymond இன் உங்கள் விழாக்கால உடைகள் சேகரிப்பில் ஒரு நேர்த்தியான சேர்க்கையை செய்யுங்கள், அதன் வளமான பாரம்பரியத்தின் தடையற்ற உருவாக்கம்,Raymond-ൽ നിന്നുള്ള Ethnix-ൽ നിന്നുള്ള നിങ്ങളുടെ സന്ദർഭ വസ്ത്ര ശേഖരത്തിൽ ഒരു വിശിഷ്ടമായ ഉൾപ്പെടുത്തൽ നടത്തുക, അതിന്‍റെ സമ്പന്നമായ പാരമ്പര്യത്തിന്‍റെ തടസ്സമില്ലാത്ത സൃഷ്ടി,Raymond द्वारा Ethnix के अपने अवसर पर पहनने के कलेक्शन में एक उत्तम समावेश बनाएं, इसकी समृद्ध विरासत का एक सहज निर्माण,Raymond ನಿಂದ Ethnix ನಿಂದ ನಿಮ್ಮ ಸಂದರ್ಭದ ಉಡುಗೆ ಸಂಗ್ರಹಕ್ಕೆ ಸೊಗಸಾದ ಸೇರ್ಪಡೆ ಮಾಡಿ, ಅದರ ಶ್ರೀಮಂತ ಪರಂಪರೆಯ ತಡೆರಹಿತ ರಚನೆ,

product_description: Raymond వారి Ethnix నుండి మీ సందర్భ దుస్తుల సేకరణకు సున్నితమైన చేరికను ఇవ్వండి, ఇది దాని గొప్ప వారసత్వాన్ని యొక్క నిరంతర సృష్టింపు,Make an exquisite inclusion to your occasion wear collection from Ethnix by Raymond, A seamless creation of its rich heritage,Raymond এর Ethnix থেকে আপনার অনুষ্ঠানে একটি দুর্দান্ত অন্তর্ভুক্তি তৈরি করুন, এর সমৃদ্ধ ঐতিহ্যের এক নির্বিঘ্ন সৃষ্টি,Raymond द्वारे Ethnix कडून आपल्या प्रसंगी पोशाख संग्रहात एक उत्कृष्ट समावेश करा, त्याच्या समृद्ध वारशाची अखंड निर्मिती,Raymond-ൽ നിന്നുള്ള Ethnix-ൽ നിന്നുള്ള നിങ്ങളുടെ സന്ദർഭ വസ്ത്ര ശേഖരത്തിൽ ഒരു വിശിഷ്ടമായ ഉൾപ്പെടുത്തൽ നടത്തുക, അതിന്‍റെ സമ്പന്നമായ പാരമ്പര്യത്തിന്‍റെ തടസ്സമില്ലാത്ത സൃഷ്ടി,Ethnix by Raymond இன் உங்கள் விழாக்கால உடைகள் சேகரிப்பில் ஒரு நேர்த்தியான சேர்க்கையை செய்யுங்கள், அதன் வளமான பாரம்பரியத்தின் தடையற்ற உருவாக்கம்,रेमंड द्वारा एथनिक्स से अपने अवसर पहनने के संग्रह के लिए एक उत्कृष्ट समावेश करें, इसकी समृद्ध विरासत का एक सहज निर्माण,Raymond ನಿಂದ Ethnix ನಿಂದ ನಿಮ್ಮ ಸಂದರ್ಭದ ಉಡುಗೆ ಸಂಗ್ರಹಕ್ಕೆ ಸೊಗಸಾದ ಸೇರ್ಪಡೆ ಮಾಡಿ, ಅದರ ಶ್ರೀಮಂತ ಪರಂಪರೆಯ ತಡೆರಹಿತ ರಚನೆ,

product_description: Manyavar యొక్క కాలాతీతమైన వేడుక సేకరణలో సున్నితమైన షెర్వానీస్, చక్కటి ఇండో-వెస్ట్రన్స్, రాయల్ బందగాలాస్, క్లాసిక్ కుర్తా-జాకెట్లు మరియు జీవిత ప్రత్యేక క్షణాల కోసం సరిపోయే ఉపకరణాలు ఉన్నాయి. జూనియర్లను వదలి వెళ్లకుండా, Manyavar వారి పిల్లల సాంప్రదాయ మరియు ఫ్యూజన్ వేర్ లైన్తో ప్రారంభమైంది, ఇది చిన్నపిల్లలకు ఆనందాన్ని కలిగిస్తుంది.Manyavar’s timeless celebration collection includes exquisite Sherwanis, fine Indo-Westerns, Royal Bandhgalas, classic Kurta-Jackets and matching accessories for life’s special moments. Not leaving behind the juniors, Manyavar started with their Kid’s Ethnic and Fusion wear line which was a delight to the little ones.

Tailored from fine quality fabric and fashioned with a banded collar for a dash of style. This jacket is comfortable to wear and easy to maintain. Layer it over any outfit for a contemporary look. It goes best with ethnic kurta-pyjama or churidar. It is a great addition to your wardrobe and will win you compliments from one and all.

product_description: Raymond వారి Ethnix నుండి మీ సందర్భ దుస్తుల సేకరణకు సున్నితమైన చేరికను ఇవ్వండి, ఇది దాని గొప్ప వారసత్వాన్ని యొక్క నిరంతర సృష్టింపు.Make an exquisite inclusion to your occasion wear collection from Ethnix by Raymond, a seamless creation of its rich heritage,.Raymond এর Ethnix থেকে আপনার অনুষ্ঠানে একটি দুর্দান্ত অন্তর্ভুক্তি তৈরি করুন, এর সমৃদ্ধ ঐতিহ্যের এক নির্বিঘ্ন সৃষ্টি,.Raymond द्वारे Ethnix कडून आपल्या प्रसंगी परिधान संग्रहात एक उत्कृष्ट समावेश करा, त्याच्या समृद्ध वारशाची अखंड निर्मिती आहे.നിങ്ങളുടെ സന്ദർഭ വസ്ത്ര ശേഖരത്തിൽ ഒരു വിശിഷ്ടമായ ഉൾപ്പെടുത്തൽ നടത്തുക, Ethnix by Raymond-ൽ നിന്നുള്ള സമ്പന്നമായ പാരമ്പര്യത്തിന്‍റെ തടസ്സമില്ലാത്ത സൃഷ്ടി.Ethnix by Raymond இன் உங்கள் விழாக்கால உடைகள் சேகரிப்பில் ஒரு நேர்த்தியான சேர்க்கையை செய்யுங்கள், அதன் வளமான பாரம்பரியத்தின் தடையற்ற உருவாக்கம்.रेमंड द्वारा एथनिक्स से अपने अवसर पहनने के संग्रह के लिए एक उत्कृष्ट समावेश करें, जो इसकी समृद्ध विरासत का एक सहज निर्माण है।Raymond ಅವರ Ethnix ನಿಂದ ನಿಮ್ಮ ಸಂದರ್ಭದ ಉಡುಗೆ ಸಂಗ್ರಹಕ್ಕೆ ಸೊಗಸಾದ ಸೇರ್ಪಡೆ ಮಾಡಿ, ಇದು ಅದರ ಶ್ರೀಮಂತ ಪರಂಪರೆಯ ತಡೆರಹಿತ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಾಗಿದೆ.

product_description: Raymond వారి Ethnix నుండి మీ సందర్భ దుస్తుల సేకరణకు సున్నితమైన చేరికను ఇవ్వండి, ఇది దాని గొప్ప వారసత్వాన్ని యొక్క నిరంతర సృష్టింపు.Make an exquisite inclusion to your occasion wear collection from Ethnix by Raymond, a seamless creation of its rich heritage,.Raymond এর Ethnix থেকে আপনার অনুষ্ঠানে একটি দুর্দান্ত অন্তর্ভুক্তি তৈরি করুন, এর সমৃদ্ধ ঐতিহ্যের এক নির্বিঘ্ন সৃষ্টি,.Raymond द्वारे Ethnix कडून आपल्या प्रसंगी परिधान संग्रहात एक उत्कृष्ट समावेश करा, त्याच्या समृद्ध वारशाची अखंड निर्मिती आहे.Ethnix by Raymond இன் உங்கள் விழாக்கால உடைகள் சேகரிப்பில் ஒரு நேர்த்தியான சேர்க்கையை செய்யுங்கள், அதன் வளமான பாரம்பரியத்தின் தடையற்ற உருவாக்கம்.നിങ്ങളുടെ സന്ദർഭ വസ്ത്ര ശേഖരത്തിൽ ഒരു വിശിഷ്ടമായ ഉൾപ്പെടുത്തൽ നടത്തുക, Ethnix by Raymond-ൽ നിന്നുള്ള സമ്പന്നമായ പാരമ്പര്യത്തിന്‍റെ തടസ്സമില്ലാത്ത സൃഷ്ടി.रेमंड द्वारा एथनिक्स से अपने अवसर पहनने के संग्रह के लिए एक उत्कृष्ट समावेश करें, जो इसकी समृद्ध विरासत का एक सहज निर्माण है।Raymond ಅವರ Ethnix ನಿಂದ ನಿಮ್ಮ ಸಂದರ್ಭದ ಉಡುಗೆ ಸಂಗ್ರಹಕ್ಕೆ ಸೊಗಸಾದ ಸೇರ್ಪಡೆ ಮಾಡಿ, ಇದು ಅದರ ಶ್ರೀಮಂತ ಪರಂಪರೆಯ ತಡೆರಹಿತ ಸೃಷ್ಟಿಯಾಗಿದೆ.

product_description: Vastramay introduces to you these classy sherwani for men stylish latest design in variety of material and designs for all occassions. This fabric has been designed keeping in mind the latest trends in a semi formal fashion or occassional fashion. Engineering garments which fit all body types and style is our aim. We offer not just servani for man for wedding but also indo western for men and semi sherwani as well covering the entire space. Our servani are constructed in such a way that you can adorn it with a churidar, dhoti for men or a patiala too. To complete the look adorn a mojari or jutti slippers for men stylish, you may also try an authentic Kohlapuri chappal for men, the fashionistas and millennial folks may experiment with a brogues or oxfords juta for men stylish. Suitable for: Party, Weddings, Regular Wear, Celebrations, Occasions, Festivals, Lohri, Pongal, Makar Sakranti, Baisakhi, Holi, Eid, Raksha Bandhan, Dussehra, Diwali, Navratri, Pooja, Christmas, Onam, Ganesh Chaturthi, Janmasthmi and Gifts for Mens.
